forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds with mostly clear skies late. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 55F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
